subtitle: as he unraveled The Whispers of Ages
past
the temple priests unveiled a saga of a
city born 9 000 years before
characterized by technological Marvels
that danced on the edge of magic
Atlantis cradled between the pillars of
Hercules and the Atlantic Oceans Embrace
which is between modern-day Spain and
Morocco was the great City located
the city in ancient maps unfolds as a
masterpiece of geography
vast planes sprawl across its Southern
expanse stretching over 345 miles while
mountains rise majestically to the north
an island of concentric Rings emerges
alternating between land and water with
a Regal Palace at its heart dedicated to
the god enki also known as Poseidon
the atlanteans brilliant Engineers wove
a fabric of innovation Bridges spanned
chasms canals carved Pathways and baths
brimmed with the healing Embrace of Hot
and Cold Springs
